DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the participants have improved their scores on health related quality of life (HRQL) 1 year after completing a learning and mastery course and whether sociodemographic variables are associated with HRQL.
DOC.brief_title: Learning and Coping With Chronic Illness
DOC.detailed_description: Persons with chronic illnesses have to adjust to changes in their life-style. In the last 10 years Learning and Mastery Centres have been established in Norwegian hospitals to offer patient education for the chronically ill. It is not known whether these courses impact any changes in HRQL 1 year after course completion.
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of morbid obesity attending learning and mastery course for the obese
